name: Ice Hockey Massacre
description:
Ice Hockey Massacre is a found-footage bullet hell horror game about a massacre occurring during an ice hockey match, caused by expired chewing tobacco (a pleasure of the gods). Witness the horror as a stadium full of hockey players is massacred composed of the national teams of Brundigvalla and Bördirbüng. Even the army can't stop the massacre!

Don't look at the nicotine product for too long. Definitely don't listen to what it says. It's a bad idea.
